summary: Go-Bong has a huge crush on Gye-Soon who works at a fast food restaurant without knowing that the girl he love is a spy from North Korea.
cast: Jeong-hwa Kim|Yoo Gong|Sang-mi Nam|Jadu|Il-seob Baek|Seung-hee Baek|Kwang-gi Lee|Seung-yeong Lee|In-young Yoo
title: Geunyeoreul moreumyeon gancheob
